T02D3724:41a-1: sh'i la samba ra sa ma ya aa bi ru ddha n'a ma /
T02D3724:41a-3: tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba /
T02D3724:41a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3724:41a-5: dpal tshogs kun mkhyen dam pa'i dbang phyug snying rje'i mchog gi bdud rtsis brlan ba'i blo gros can //
T02D3724:41a-6: gzhan don yon tan dri med bden pa'i rin chen
T02D3724:41a-7: rin thang med pa mang po 'thob pa'i mchog /'gro
T02D3724:41a-8: ba nyon mong sa ha la ha la'i dug zos
T02D3724:41a-9: rnams la chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char pa yis //
T02D3724:41a-10: mya ngan 'das pa dam pa'i don byed pa yi dpal ldan gang yin khyed kyis rtag tu srungs //
T02D3724:41a-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing //
T02D3724:41a-12: bde gshegs byin rlabs med pa dang //
T02D3724:41a-13: mang du thos pa dang bral zhing //
T02D3724:41a-14: thos pa nyung du sa chog shes pa //
T02D3724:41a-15: mkhas pa nyid du rlom byed rnams //
T02D3724:41a-16: rgyud dang sngags dang phyag rgya sogs //
T02D3724:41a-17: sbyin la sogs dang sangs rgyas yum //
T02D3724:41a-18: lung nod ji bzhin ma rtogs pas //
T02D3724:41a-19: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i //
T02D3724:41a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom //
T02D3724:41a-21: dang por bzung nas de 'og tu //
T02D3724:41a-22: rab tu byung nas dge slong ngam //
T02D3724:41a-23: dang por rab tu byung brtan nas //
T02D3724:41a-24: sngags dang pha rol phyin lam nas //
T02D3724:41a-25: phyi nas de rnams rmongs sogs kyis //
T02D3724:41a-26: 'dul ba yi ni bstan bcos las //
T02D3724:41a-27: nyan thos la sogs sdom gnas pa //
T02D3724:41a-28: so sor thar dang lo drir gnas //
T02D3724:41a-29: der bstan pa yi bslab pa rnams //
T02D3724:41a-30: phal cher bsrung bar ma nus pas //
T02D3724:41a-31: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang //
T02D3724:41a-32: 'gal ba nyid du gnas bzung nas //
T02D3724:41a-33: de ltar de spangs rnam par gnas //
T02D3724:41a-34: de dag mi shes bsal phyir dang //
T02D3724:41a-35: bstan pa 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D3724:41b-0: rig @41b 'dzin gyi ni dam tshig rnams //
T02D3724:41b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang //
T02D3724:41b-2: so sor thar gsungs sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:41b-5: sgrub pa lung bzhin bya ba ni //
T02D3724:41b-6: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal snga nas //
T02D3724:41b-7: yang dag shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D3724:41b-8: mngon par rtogs pa brgyad rnams dang //
T02D3724:41b-9: dam tshig dbang bskur thob pa yis //
T02D3724:41b-10: shin tu man ngag dang ldan pas //
T02D3724:41b-11: dpal ldan 'dus sogs rgyud kyi don //
T02D3724:41b-12: rim pa gnyis ni rnam dbye ba //
T02D3724:41b-13: thob pa nges bsam snying rje yis //
T02D3724:41b-14: bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub phyir //
T02D3724:41b-15: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de //
T02D3724:41b-16: kun las phyir mi ldog brtan bya //
T02D3724:41b-17: thabs kyi rang bzhin bya ba 'am //
T02D3724:41b-18: bsgom pa yi ni lam dag ste //
T02D3724:41b-19: sbyin la sogs pa'i bslab pa la //
T02D3724:41b-20: yang na sngags spyod rim pa las //
T02D3724:41b-21: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni //
T02D3724:41b-22: bsten pa yongs su gtang mi bya //
T02D3724:41b-23: mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba yi //
T02D3724:41b-24: gtsug lag gi ni bstan bcos dang //
T02D3724:41b-25: gtsug lag ma yin lo dri sogs //
T02D3724:41b-26: slob dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
T02D3724:41b-27: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi //
T02D3724:41b-28: so sor thar sogs sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:41b-29: dge slong blo dang ldan pa yis //
T02D3724:41b-30: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bsten //
T02D3724:41b-31: bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub dang //
T02D3724:41b-32: dpal ldan 'chi bdag las rgyal ba'i //
T02D3724:41b-33: bstan pa yang ni bsrung phyir dang //
T02D3724:41b-34: de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gnas pa'i //
T02D3724:41b-35: mi dang lha sogs 'jig rten rnams //
T02D3724:41b-36: sems sun 'byin pa gzhom phyir ro //
T02D3724:41b-37: sdom ba'i rnam par dbye ba ni //
T02D3724:41b-38: dpal ldan rgyal bas gang gsungs pa //
T02D3724:41b-39: phan tshun 'gal ba dag tu ni //
T02D3724:41b-40: gang yang nam du'ang gnas ma yin //
T02D3724:41b-41: chos 'dul las ni bcom ldan gyis //
T02D3724:41b-42: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:41b-43: rnam pa brgyad gsungs 'di lta ste //
T02D3724:41b-44: dge slong dang ni dge slong ma //
T02D3724:41b-45: dge slob dge tshul dge tshul ma //
T02D3724:41b-46: de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma //
T02D3724:41b-47: bsnyen gnas la ni gnas pa'o //
T02D3724:41b-48: de rnams bslab pa'ang rnam dbye ba //
T02D3724:41b-49: dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang chen po //
T02D3724:42a-2: dge bsnyen pho mo dag gi sdom //
T02D3724:42a-3: rnam pa lnga ru rab bstan te //
T02D3724:42a-4: 'di ltar srog gcod spong ba nas //
T02D3724:42a-6: dge tshul pho mo'i sngom dag ni //
T02D3724:42a-7: mgon pos rnam pa bcur gsungs te //
T02D3724:42a-8: srog gcod pa la sogs pa nas //
T02D3724:42a-9: ji srid gser dngul la sogs pa //
T02D3724:42a-10: len pa spong ba'i bar du'o //
T02D3724:42a-11: de bzhin gzhan ni bar slob ma'i //
T02D3724:42a-12: 'dul las bcu gnyis nyid yin te //
T02D3724:42a-13: chos dang rjes su mthun pa rnams //
T02D3724:42a-14: thar pa'i lam ni dag phyir gsungs //
T02D3724:42a-15: thub pa thugs rje chen po yis //
T02D3724:42a-16: spang bya thams cad spangs ba ni //
T02D3724:42a-17: dge slong dge slong ma rnams kyi //
T02D3724:42a-18: sdom pa yin par gsungs pa yin //
T02D3724:42a-19: thub pa thugs rje chen po yis //
T02D3724:42a-20: glu dang gar sogs phreng ba sogs //
T02D3724:42a-21: gcig byas phyed dang dus min zas //
T02D3724:42a-22: bar gyi spang bya brgyad spangs pa ;
T02D3724:42a-23: / bsnyen gnas kyi ni sdom par gsungs //
T02D3724:42a-24: sbyin la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos //
T02D3724:42a-25: bya ba thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas //
T02D3724:42a-26: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru //
T02D3724:42a-27: bstan pa rgyal ba'i dbang po yis //
T02D3724:42a-28: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi //
T02D3724:42a-29: sdom pa nyid du gsungs pa yin //
T02D3724:42a-30: phyag rgya sngags sogs rnal 'byor gyi //
T02D3724:42a-31: rim pa gnyis la brten pa las //
T02D3724:42a-32: rdo rje ye shes lus ngag gi / lha yi rnam pa rab bsgoms pa //
T02D3724:42a-33: thabs dang ldan par sgrub pa ni //
T02D3724:42a-34: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab 'grub pas //
T02D3724:42a-35: so sor thar sngom gyis de 'grub //
T02D3724:42a-36: gsang sngags sbyin sogs dbye ba las //
T02D3724:42a-37: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis //
T02D3724:42a-38: dge slong la sogs dbye bya ste //
T02D3724:42a-39: dge slong sogs sdom dbye ba med //
T02D3724:42a-40: dge slong nyid sdom gcig yin te //
T02D3724:42a-41: de bzhin len dang bsgrub pa'ang gcig / rab byung sdom pa btang nas ni //
T02D3724:42a-42: sngags kyi sdom dang sbyin sogs kyi //
T02D3724:42a-43: sdom pa yang ni gzung mi bya //
T02D3724:42a-44: gsang sngags kyi ni sdom pa dang //
T02D3724:42a-45: sbyin sogs sdom pas bsdams pa dang //
T02D3724:42a-46: rnyed dang bkur sti'i rgyu yis sam //
T02D3724:42a-48: rab byung sdom pa len 'dod na //
T02D3724:42b-0: dge slong min pas @42b sdom mi bya //
T02D3724:42b-1: gsang sngags sbyin sogs ldan pa ni //
T02D3724:42b-2: rab byung sdom pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02D3724:42b-3: 'phags pa mgon po byams pa yis //
T02D3724:42b-4: 'di ltar mkhyen te gsungs pa ni //
T02D3724:42b-5: rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dag ni //
T02D3724:42b-6: yon tan tshad med rnams dang ldan //
T02D3724:42b-7: de ltar sdom brtson khyim pa yi ;
T02D3724:42b-8: / byang chub sems las khyad par 'phags //
T02D3724:42b-9: gsang sogs lam dang sbyin sogs kyi //
T02D3724:42b-10: lam nyid dag ni dge slong gis //
T02D3724:42b-11: dge slong mkhas las blang bya yi //
T02D3724:42b-12: gzhan nyid las ni ma yin no //
T02D3724:42b-13: sngags dang sbyin sogs la gnas pa'i //
T02D3724:42b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:42b-15: tshul khrims pha rol phyin rnam gsum //
T02D3724:42b-16: dang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang //
T02D3724:42b-17: dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims dang //
T02D3724:42b-18: sems can don byed tshul khrims te //
T02D3724:42b-20: rgyal bas 'dul ba'i sde snod las //
T02D3724:42b-21: dge slong sdom gar gsungs de ni //
T02D3724:42b-22: dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D3724:42b-23: tshul khrims sdom pa'i cha ru 'gyur //
T02D3724:42b-24: dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
T02D3724:42b-25: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D3724:42b-26: dbugs dbyung dag la brten nas ni //
T02D3724:42b-27: rdo rje'i lam ni gnyis su gnas //
T02D3724:42b-28: de la bde gshegs dbugs dbyung ba //
T02D3724:42b-29: dge slong rnams la zhi sems kyis //
T02D3724:42b-30: ma lus spros pa dang bral ba //
T02D3724:42b-31: gsungs pa dbang spyod sogs rim bya //
T02D3724:42b-32: phyi rol shes rab spangs nas ni //
T02D3724:42b-33: rtag tu rang snang shes rab ldan //
T02D3724:42b-34: de la 'dul las gsungs pa yi //
T02D3724:42b-35: sdom pa yis ni byang chub sgrub //
T02D3724:42b-36: rdo rje'i bdag nyid thob pa yi //
T02D3724:42b-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i rol pa ni //
T02D3724:42b-38: dge slong bdag nyid gyur pa yi //
T02D3724:42b-39: dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs //
T02D3724:42b-40: gos dkar sogs dang snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D3724:42b-41: do shal dpung rgyan gdu bu yis //
T02D3724:42b-42: rnam par brgyan cing gos dag ni //
T02D3724:42b-43: shin tu bzang po bsnams pa ru //
T02D3724:42b-44: dpal ldan 'dus sogs las byung bas //
T02D3724:42b-45: sems can kun gyi don 'gyur ro //
T02D3724:42b-46: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba //
T02D3724:42b-47: rtag tu khyim pa sbyang bya'i phyir //
T02D3724:42b-48: dbang bskur la sogs rim pa ni //
T02D3724:43a-0: spros dang bcas pa de la @43a * //
T02D3724:43a-2: / sems sogs 'os su gyur pa la //
T02D3724:43a-3: phyi rol rig ma'i dbang bskur bya //
T02D3724:43a-4: spros pa med pas rab byung la //
T02D3724:43a-5: dge slong rnams kyis de sbyin te //
T02D3724:43a-6: 'dul la sogs pa'i sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:43a-7: thams cad ldan pa'i slob ma la //
T02D3724:43a-8: rtag tu rang snang shes rab kyis //
T02D3724:43a-9: bsgom pa gsal bar bya phyir ro //
T02D3724:43a-10: sbyin sogs spyod dang sngags sogs spyod //
T02D3724:43a-11: rnal 'byor gnas pa'i bdag nyid dag / rdzogs pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas chos //
T02D3724:43a-12: rang dang gzhan la rab bsgrub par //
T02D3724:43a-13: rab tu 'jug pa'i dge slong gi //
T02D3724:43a-14: dngos gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D3724:43a-15: bse ru nyan thos nyid gnas pa'i //
T02D3724:43a-16: zhi ba 'dod pa'i dge slong gis //
T02D3724:43a-17: 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa yang //
T02D3724:43a-18: phra mo tsam yang gtang mi bya //
T02D3724:43a-19: khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang //
T02D3724:43a-20: gang tshe tshangs spyod nyid bsrungs na //
T02D3724:43a-21: rab byung byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D3724:43a-22: rang gi tshul khrims ji ltar dor //
T02D3724:43a-23: dpal ldan mgon po byams pa yis //
T02D3724:43a-24: rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang //
T02D3724:43a-25: 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid do //
T02D3724:43a-26: byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs so //
T02D3724:43a-27: dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D3724:43a-28: spyin sogs bya ba'i lam gyis sam //
T02D3724:43a-29: yang na sngags kyi sdom pa yis //
T02D3724:43a-30: gnas te de nyid sgrub byed pas //
T02D3724:43a-31: 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:43a-32: ji srid 'tsho yi bar du bsrung //
T02D3724:43a-33: dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang po ni //
T02D3724:43a-34: thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin des //
T02D3724:43a-35: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la //
T02D3724:43a-36: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
T02D3724:43a-37: zhes bya bar ni gsungs pa yin //
T02D3724:43a-38: sdom pa rnams ni sdom pa yin //
T02D3724:43a-39: gong nas gong du rjes 'jug ste //
T02D3724:43a-40: 'di ltar dge bsnyen sdom pa ni //
T02D3724:43a-41: dge tshul gyi ni rjes su 'jug / gang de
T02D3724:43a-42: dge slong rjes su 'jug / gang dag nyan thos
T02D3724:43a-43: dge slong gi // sdom gsungs byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02D3724:43a-44: rjes su 'jug ste kun ldan pas //
T02D3724:43a-45: dge slong shin tu khyad par 'phags //
T02D3724:43a-46: bya ba thabs kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02D3724:43a-47: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ste //
T02D3724:43b-0: sngags pas sbyin la sogs pa @43b ste ;
T02D3724:43b-1: / thams cad du ni 'jug par bya //
T02D3724:43b-2: gal te sdom pa 'gal gyur na //
T02D3724:43b-3: dge slong gis ni sdom pa rnams //
T02D3724:43b-4: phul bar gyur na dge tshul dang //
T02D3724:43b-5: dge bsnyen yang ni mi gnas 'gyur //
T02D3724:43b-6: sems can don la ltos pa yis //
T02D3724:43b-7: so sor thar gsungs sdom gtong zhes //
T02D3724:43b-8: gal te de ltar rjod byed na //
T02D3724:43b-9: de dag nges par rmongs pa yin //
T02D3724:43b-10: blo ldan khyad par 'phags pa yi //
T02D3724:43b-11: dge slong byang chub sems dpa' ni //
T02D3724:43b-12: thabs la mkhas pas thams cad du //
T02D3724:43b-13: rmi lam du yang 'gal mi bsam //
T02D3724:43b-14: sbyin la sogs pa bya ba'am //
T02D3724:43b-15: yang na de nyid bsgom bya yin ;
T02D3724:43b-16: / dge slong sems can don bsgrub pa'am //
T02D3724:43b-17: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje che //
T02D3724:43b-18: gzhan don byed par 'dod rnams kyis //
T02D3724:43b-19: 'dul la sogs pa'i dge slong gis //
T02D3724:43b-20: bya ba tshul khrims khyad 'phags phyir //
T02D3724:43b-21: tshul khrims lhag par bsten par bya //
T02D3724:43b-22: 'dul ba las brjod tshul khrims ni //
T02D3724:43b-23: dge slong nyid du bsgrub bya'i phyir //
T02D3724:43b-24: ji srid 'tsho bar bsten bya ba //
T02D3724:43b-25: sems can don yin gtang mi bya //
T02D3724:43b-26: sngags sogs bsgom pa gnas pa dang //
T02D3724:43b-27: sbyin pa sogs la gnas pa yi //
T02D3724:43b-28: dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D3724:43b-29: so sor thar gsungs bslab pa ni //
T02D3724:43b-30: nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D3724:43b-32: de ltar ma gyur rnam nges na //
T02D3724:43b-33: yang dag byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D3724:43b-34: dge slong sdom pa yang dag pa //
T02D3724:43b-35: so sor thar la gnas par bya //
T02D3724:43b-36: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams la //
T02D3724:43b-37: gus pas lung dang rigs pa yis //
T02D3724:43b-38: shin tu dri ma med cing mi 'gal sdom rnams byas pa las //
T02D3724:43b-39: bdag gis zla 'od lta bu'i dge ba bsags pa gang yin des //
T02D3724:43b-40: 'jig rten ma lus dpal ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po
T02D3724:43b-41: myur 'grub shog / tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang
T02D3724:43b-42: dam tshig mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba /
T02D3724:43b-43: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3724:43b-45: // / kha che'i mkhan po dzny'a na shr'i bha dra de nyid dang /
T02D3724:43b-46: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong blo gros snying po dang /
